topic.title: LOOKING FOR MOBB DEEP - The Infamous album 1995
topic.body: If anyone has this album on their PC please let me know i want it :)

topic.title: ZeroPlay
topic.body: Why is arethe files on play so huge?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: this will take some time getting used to for a noob like myself

1_1MsUAPBMZkBpt4Z46849vSJQxRHbR7HyMt.body: How can I add movies to Play?

1_1DjUq8hd2jYZgc5uNhQEtWUVZjMHkMQkpU.body: wondering how safe it is to upload movies to torrents on zeronet

> [tkarita](#comment_59_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): Posting to ZeroTorrent is untraceable.  Actually seeding the content might harm your anonymity, especially if nobody else has a copy.

Any way around that?

> [tkarita](#comment_60_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): You could use Tor and a seedbox.  Some of them accept bitcoin.

Haven't been able to use zeronet on Tor... I think I am too noob to work it out. Still learning more about zeronet daily.

1_1AeoDwzudke45NR3b6LfU4LsmPFs8AXUvi.body:
> [tkarita](#comment_100_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): FLAC
> M4A

I <3 You so much

2_1AeoDwzudke45NR3b6LfU4LsmPFs8AXUvi.body:
> [kopykate](#comment_70_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4): Eh. It depends on what kind of video quality you're aiming for? Jeez man .. beggars aren't exactly choosers, but whatever .. lol

dude when kat was around, there were some awesome uploaders putting out HQ vids for under a gig.
